# Dødelig Equipment
## Overview
***[[Dødelig]] have access to the following equipment.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Dødelig|dødelig]] equipment introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Bone Xylophone]]
- [[Dødelig Instrument Bandolier]]
- [[Firearm Rules]]
- [[Obsidian Bullets]]
